Settings.hintEmailCannotChange: Email address cannot be changed currently.

Forms.newFormSubtitle: Design your form and add fields
Forms.showingFirst50: Showing first 50 responses. Export CSV for all data.
Forms.formPublishedSuccess: Form published! It's now accepting responses.
Forms.formUnpublishedSuccess: Form unpublished. It's no longer accepting responses.

Speakers.createNewSpeakerDescription: Add a speaker to track who spoke and their topic
Speakers.topicHint: Describe the topic or subject of the talk
Speakers.speakerIsConfirmedHint: Check this box if the speaker has confirmed they will speak
Speakers.errorNotAuthenticated: Not authenticated. Please log in again.
Speakers.errorInsufficientPermissions: Only leaders and admins can create speakers.

Apps.title: Apps Hub
Apps.subtitle: Connect apps to enhance your workspace
Apps.appConnectedDescription: {name} has been connected to your workspace.

Notebooks.noNotesYetDescription: Start writing in this notebook by creating your first note.
Notebooks.deleteNotebookDescription: This will permanently delete "{title}" and all notes inside it. This action cannot be undone.

Schedule.noWorkspace: No workspace found. Please set up your workspace first.
Schedule.errorLoading: Error loading meetings. Please try again.

Discussions.cardDescription: Add a topic for ongoing discussion and decision tracking

Discussions.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the discussion topic and what needs to be decided...

Business.errorNotAuthenticated: Not authenticated. Please log in again.

Announcements.cardDescription: Add a time-based announcement for your organization
Announcements.displayStartHint: When to start showing this announcement
Announcements.displayUntilHint: When to stop showing this announcement
Announcements.errorNotAuthenticated: Not authenticated. Please log in again.
Announcements.errorPermission: Only leaders and admins can create announcements.

Welcome.title: Welcome
Welcome.subtitle: How would you like to get started?
Welcome.createWorkspaceDescription: Start fresh with a new workspace
Welcome.pleaseSignUpOrLogIn: Please sign up or log in first.

AcceptInvite.descriptionLoading: Please wait while we process your invitation.
AcceptInvite.descriptionError: Something went wrong with your invitation.
AcceptInvite.needsAuthSignUpOrLogin: Please sign up or log in to accept this invitation.
AcceptInvite.invalidLinkNoToken: Invalid invitation link. No token provided.
AcceptInvite.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

CheckEmail.title: Check your email
CheckEmail.sentConfirmationTo: We've sent a confirmation link to
CheckEmail.instructions: Click the link in the email to verify your account and complete setup. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

Login.title: Sign in
Login.description: Enter your email and password to access your account
Login.emailNotConfirmedDescription: Please check your inbox for the confirmation link.
Login.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
ForgotPassword.description: Enter your email address to reset your password
ForgotPassword.successDescription: We have sent a password reset link to {email}.
ForgotPassword.didNotReceive: Did not receive the email? Check your spam folder or
ForgotPassword.checkInboxToast: Check your inbox for the password reset link.
ForgotPassword.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

ResetPassword.title: Reset password
ResetPassword.verifyingDescription: Please wait while we verify your secure link...
ResetPassword.invalidLinkDescription: Unable to verify your session. The link may have expired or is invalid.
ResetPassword.sessionExpired: Your session has expired or was not found. Please request a new password reset link.
ResetPassword.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully.

Signup.title: Create an account
Signup.description: Enter your invite code and information to get started
Signup.validatingInvitationDescription: Please wait while we verify your invitation...
Signup.inviteOnlyNotice: Beespo is currently invite-only. Enter your invite code to continue.
Signup.emailLockedByInvitation: This email was used for your invitation and cannot be changed.
Signup.invalidInviteCodeDescription: Please enter a valid invite code to continue.
Signup.invalidInviteCodeGoogleDescription: Please enter a valid invite code before signing up with Google.
Signup.invitationNoLongerValid: This invitation link is no longer valid.
Signup.workspaceInvitationNoLongerValid: Your workspace invitation is no longer valid.
Signup.emailMismatchDescription: Please use the email address the invitation was sent to.
Signup.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Signup.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions to create an account.
Signup.inviteCodeNoLongerValid: The invite code is no longer valid. Please get a new code.
Signup.emailAlreadyRegistered: This email is already registered. Please use the login page instead.
Signup.checkEmailDescription: We've sent a confirmation link to your email address.
Signup.accountCreatedJoinWorkspace: Account created! Let's get you set up to join {workspaceName}.
Signup.accountCreatedCompleteProfile: Account created successfully! Please complete your profile.
Signup.failedToValidateInvitation: Failed to validate invitation. Please try again.
Signup.failedToSignInWithGoogle: Failed to sign in with Google
Signup.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

LiveMeeting.meetingNotFound: Meeting not found or no longer shared.
LiveMeeting.publicViewInfo: This is a public view of the meeting agenda. Notes and detailed discussions are only visible to workspace members.
